page.title: 01LIFE STYLES : FENNY COMPTON.
page.content: {SUMMARY OF AREA SURVEYED:}The grid area is made up of green & pleasant level farmland to the NW.& rolling hills to the S & E.{FENNY COMPTON } is a cmpact area in the shape of an 8, with roadsout at the top and the bottom.Older houses are of stone, the rural character is unspoilt,and local services are excellent-water,sewarage electricity,highways,education,general amenities,religion,recreation,trade, farming,light industry,canal & marina,health & ecology, home life, entertainments,customs,information systems,communications - all are areas covered by the Survey made by the children of Fenny Compton C.E.School as a part of their educational activity for the Summer Term of 1985.Final selection and entry was done by the Headmaster,{W.H.STUBBINGS} who has held that post since 1945.
